2. start debugging of the app

ive.

Seems to be a workspace related problem, with other workspaces this error do not occur.

The sash weights stored in your preferences are invalid.  If the view opens (just with strange sash weights) you can resize them to reset the stored values.  Other than that, you will have to clear your workspace metadata/preferences.

There were some improvements to this in 3.3.

Closing as WONTFIX, there is no indication that the platform is causing the weights to be invalid and this problem has not been seen in late 3.3.

Hi Curtis,

I deleted the sash related stuff in .metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.core.runtime/.settings/org.eclipse.debug.ui.prefs
and now it is working again ...

One value there became negative ... howevery this happend.

Thanks
Steffen
